objects.name: Decorations
objects.description: Cosmetic items for tank customization including wraps, decals, and stickers.

objects.name: Tanks
objects.description: Player-controlled tanks with attributes like speed, damage, and fire rate.

objects.name: Artifacts
objects.description: Special items that provide buffs or effects to tanks.

systems.name: Customization System
systems.description: System allowing players to customize their tanks with decorations and artifacts.
systems.mechanics: Players can apply decorations and artifacts to their tanks via mapping tables.

systems.name: Quest System
systems.description: System managing daily, weekly, and event-based quests.
systems.mechanics: Tracks quest progress and rewards for players.
systems.objectives: Provide structured goals and rewards to players.

systems.name: Shop System
systems.description: System handling in-game purchases of decorations, artifacts, and bundles.
systems.mechanics: Records transactions and deducts currency from player accounts.
systems.objectives: Monetize the game through in-game purchases.

systems.name: Match History System
systems.description: System tracking match outcomes and player performance.
systems.mechanics: Logs match details including team compositions, scores, and results.
systems.objectives: Provide a record of player performance and enable leaderboards.

logic_rules.description: Defines how quest progress is updated and completed.
logic_rules.trigger: Player performs actions tied to quest requirements.
logic_rules.effect: Updates quest progress and grants rewards upon completion.

logic_rules.description: Defines how purchases are processed and recorded.
logic_rules.trigger: Player initiates purchase of an item.
logic_rules.effect: Deducts currency and adds item to player's inventory.

requirements.title: Customization Feature Implementation
requirements.description: Implement the ability for players to customize tanks with decorations and artifacts.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players can apply and remove decorations/artifacts via UI.

requirements.title: Quest Tracking System
requirements.description: Develop system to track and reward player quest progress.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Quest progress updates dynamically and rewards are granted upon completion.

requirements.title: Shop Integration
requirements.description: Integrate shop system for purchasing decorations, artifacts, and bundles.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players can purchase items using in-game currencies or real money.

requirements.title: Match History Tracking
requirements.description: Implement system to log match outcomes and player performance.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Match details are accurately recorded and accessible via UI.
